title: QIA CEO on Strategy, Long Term Vision and Markets
description: Mohammed Saif Al-Sowaidi, Chief Executive Officer, QIA discusses the fund’s investment strategy, long-term vision and global market role with Bloomberg’s Francine Lacqua at At Invest Qatar Pavillon during the 2026 World Economic Forum. (Source: Bloomberg)
content: Mohammed Saif Al-Sowaidi, Chief Executive Officer, QIA discusses the fund’s investment strategy, long-term vision and global market role with Bloomberg’s Francine Lacqua at At Invest Qatar Pavillon during the 2026 World Economic Forum. (Source: Bloomberg)
